ComicInfo.Series: Revenge of the Cosmic Ghost Rider
ComicInfo.Summary:
Cosmic Ghost Rider's soul hangs in the balance!
Lost to the ravages of space, will Cammi be able to claw her way back to Cosmic Ghost Rider in time to keep him from making a deal with the devil?
Or will Cosmic Ghost Rider damn the whole galaxy to hell to get what he wants?
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------|-----------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Scott Hepburn & Antonio Fabela | 1 | | Var | Variant Cover | Cully Hamner & Matthew Wilson | 2 | | Var | Variant Cover | Logan Lubera & Rachelle Rosenberg | 3 |
